page.title: 08GUITING POWER.CHEERY CLUB
page.content: There are about 60 people,over 60, in the Cheery Club, as well as 14 helpers. The Club started in 1951. It helps elderly people to get out in the afternoon once a fortnight as the helpers provide transport. At the meetings they play cards,chat, have tea, and then a raffle. Once a year, they go on an outing. About 20 members attend the meetings, out of a total of 60. They raise money by having Sales and Coffee Evenings. Every Christmas, the schoolchildren entertain the Cheery Club at their Christmas party.
